programme.title: CYC TV
programme.desc: Christian Youth Channel - CYC aka Coptic Youth Channel, is a television and internet based English Coptic Orthodox Channel. CYC is the first English Coptic Christian channel, dedicated to Christians all around the world to spread the teachings and love of Jesus Christ. CYC looks to spread the word and life of Christ all through the world in a way that is compatible with today’s media consumption methods.

programme.title: CTV
programme.desc: CTV is the official channel of the Coptic Orthodox Church, run under the care and blessings of our Supreme Pontiff, His Holiness Pope Shenouda III, Pope of Alexandria and Patriarch of the See of St. Mark, may the Lord prolong his life for many years and healthy, safe eras.The channel presents all manner of art and television programs which reflect the original proper Orthodox faith and the Church's message, founded on love and peace within a framework of professional international media, which occasioned its enormous success. قناة سي تي في هي القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية، تحت رعاية قداسة البابا المعظم الأنبا تواضروس الثاني، بابا الإسكندرية وبطريرك الكرازة المرقسية، أدام الله رئاسته لنا سنينًا عديدة وأزمنة سلامية هادئة مديدة. وتقوم القناة بتقديم كافة أنواع الفنون والبرامج التليفزيونية التي تعكس أصالة وجوهر وسلامة العقيدة الأرثوذكسية ورسالة الكنيسة القائمة على المحبة والسلام في إطار من الحرفية الإعلامية.

programme.title: MESat TV
programme.desc: ME Sat TV, is a Christian Orthodox channel; aims to serve Christians worldwide through the broadcast of spiritual, social and health-related programmes. قناة مى سات، القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية تنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.title: Logos TV
programme.desc: Logos TV is a Christian Orthodox channel; its message is testimony to our good Lord Jesus Christ according to our Orthodox faith. The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

programme.title: El Maqar TV
programme.desc: El Maqar TV - A Coptic TV Channel under the see of H.H. Pope Tawadros II and his partner in the service H.G. Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.desc: A distinctively emotional round of mood-enhancing songs. حناجر ذهبية تؤدي أجمل الأغنيات التي تناسب كل الأذواق والأمزجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Arabic hits that simply strike the right note for a fulfilling musical experience. أشهر الأغاني العربية المصورة التي تناسب جميع الأذواق وتلعب على أوتار القلب فتارة يذوب حناناً ورقة، وطوراً تتسارع دقاته مع الإيقاع فيفيض حيوية وبهجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Free TV is the Number One Music channel in Lebanon. In addition to airing the largest number of latest hits and exclusive music videos, Free TV also produces different entertainment shows all of which are directly related to music and celebrities. قناة فري تي-في هي الوجهة الأولى للموسيقى في لبنان، وبالإضافة إلى بث أكبر عدد من أنجح الأغاني الحديثة، تقوم القناة بإنتاج العديد من البرامج الترفيهية المرتبطة مباشرة بالموسيقى ومشاهير عالم الفن.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: In the ocean, life goes to extraordinary lengths to survive this immense realm. A 30-tonne whale shark gorges on a school of fish. Deep sea octopus fly in the abyss and vampire squid use bioluminescence to create a colour display.

programme.title: Earth's Great Seasons
programme.desc: Celebrate spring on planet Earth, and learn about the extraordinary tricks that animals and plants find to rise to the new challenges it brings.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The ultimate portrait of our planet looks at the key factors that shape our natural history. In the Arctic spring, a mother polar bear and cubs have two weeks to cross the frozen sea. Time-lapse cameras capture the transformation created by floods.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A tour of the mountain ranges reveals how animals rise to the challenge of mountain life. The snow leopard finds habitat in the largest glaciers of the world.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Follow the descent of rivers from their mountain sources to the sea. Witness unique and dramatic moments of animal behaviour, including a piranha frenzy and a showdown between otters and crocodiles.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Although often overlooked, caves are remarkable habitats with equally bizarre wildlife. This documentary provides a unique access to a hidden world of stalactites, stalagmites, snotites and troglodytes that brings a wealth of surprises.

programme.title: Earth's Great Seasons
programme.desc: Celebrate spring on planet Earth, and learn about the extraordinary tricks that animals and plants find to rise to the new challenges it brings.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Deserts cover one fifth of the planet and they are spreading every year. We think we are familiar with the Sahara and the Kalahari but what about the Gobi or the Atacama -so many deserts have hardly been explored.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The Arctic and Antarctic experience the most extreme seasons on Earth. Time-lapse cameras watch a colony of penguins, while aerial images show a polar bear swimming more than 100 km.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: After filming for three years, the shy Mongolian gazelle and the bizarre-looking Tibetan fox are captured on film. Over six weeks, the team follows a pride of 30 lions as they attempt to hunt elephants.

programme.title: Hidden Habitats
programme.desc: The Scottish Highlands are considered one of the last truly wild places in the UK. Since the Ice Age, the Highland landscape has undergone a transformation from dense forest to open space.

programme.title: Wild Singapore
programme.desc: An exploration of Singapore's forests, which are home to some of the least known primates in the world, flying dragons, mating snakes, and many more.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Jungles cover roughly three per cent of our planet yet contain 50 per cent of the world's species. In the Ngogo forest, the largest chimpanzee group defends its territory from neighbouring groups. Other specialists include a parasitic fungi.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A humpback whale mother and calf embark on a journey from tropical coral paradises to storm-ravaged polar seas. Indonesian coral reefs reveal seahorses, clams and sea kraits. Bull fur seals attack king penguins, and sea urchins fell forests of kelp.

programme.title: Rehab Addict

programme.title: Rehab Addict

programme.desc: When a bible teaching mom goes missing from her family's farm, Missouri investigators must decipher a cryptic handwritten note. They wonder if Lynn Messer was a troubled soul or the victim of foul play. A walk in the woods uncovers a mysterious skull.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: On July 7, 2007, 18-year old Jarrod Johnston walks away from his grandmother's home in Mississippi. His Dad sees similarities between his own sister's disappearance 25-years earlier and his son's. It becomes hard to hold out hope his son will ever return.

programme.title: The Killer Beside Me
programme.desc: When Alisha Bromfield's supervisor, Brian Cooper, promotes her to team leader she should be ecstatic. But Brian's motives are not entirely good. Alisha stands her ground with Brian, letting him know she doesn't want a relationship beyond co-workers.

programme.title: The Killer Beside Me
programme.desc: Gayle Isleib was shot on April 30, 1996. Police identify a co-worker, Tyronne Montgomery. Evidence is found of stalking, plans to kidnap Gayle, murder her husband and love poems to Gayle. Tyrone Montgomery was convicted of 1st degree Murder.

programme.title: The Killer Beside Me
programme.desc: Robert Henry, an exec in Tacoma, was murdered in 1995 by a masked gunman. His wife tells the Police she thought he was killed by a former business associate. Det. Yerbury investigated and pieced together the evidence that convicted Larry Shandola.

programme.title: Who Killed Jeffrey Epstein?
programme.desc: Reclusive billionaire Jeffrey Epstein's early years are marked by a drive to amass wealth, power, and influential friends. But in 2005, his secrets are revealed when he's accused of the sexual assault of multiple underage girls.

programme.title: Who Killed Jeffrey Epstein?
programme.desc: Jeffrey Epstein leverages his considerable power and influence to avoid serious repercussions from sexual assault charges in Florida. And the accused pedophile continues to add elites to his growing social circle, including royalty.

programme.title: Who Killed Jeffrey Epstein?
programme.desc: In July 2019, Jeffrey Epstein is arrested for sex trafficking, and weeks later, he's found dying in his prison cell. When the official ruling of suicide is questioned, conspiracy theories take on new life.

programme.title: Someone You Thought You Knew
programme.desc: Chris Northam is an entrepreneur building his extreme sports business in the suburb of Roseville, California. When he is fatally gunned down in his warehouse, detectives look to his disgruntled employees and his mistress in search of the killer.

programme.title: Someone You Thought You Knew
programme.desc: Kevin and Tabatha Bryant are a picture-perfect couple, living with their two young sons in Penfield, New York. But when Tabatha is found stabbed to death at home, a steamy affair and many double lives are revealed to the town's unsuspecting residents.

programme.title: Someone You Thought You Knew
programme.desc: Gary and Jan Tyrrell are a beloved couple living in a quaint suburb of Springfield, Missouri. The tight-knit community is soon rocked by their double homicide, with friends and neighbours looking at those closest to the pair as their potential killer.

programme.title: American Monster

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a petty officer found in a Mardi Gras float storage facility with an engagement ring and proposal plan in hand. However, the case takes a mysterious turn when the team is unable to locate his supposed girlfriend.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a stolen navy-issued gun is found to belong to a Chief Petty officer who died 40 years ago, the team reopens the cold case, one that Wade has tracked and investigated for years. Also, the team prepares for their annual Thanksgiving dinner together.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A case turns personal for Pride when the body of a petty officer is identified as a former gang member he once mentored. Meanwhile, Brody continues her search for the perfect place to call home in New Orleans.
